actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 304 of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that eligibility of low-income individuals for programs thereunder shall be determined on the basis of the lower living standard budget issued by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to specify a separate method for determining economically disadvantaged and low-income individuals and families for purpose of youth and other special programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 304 of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that eligibility of low-income individuals for programs thereunder shall be determined on the basis of the lower living standard budget issued by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.
